visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'

motion.scroll_reveal: Use Framer Motion for 'whileInView' fade-ups with 0.1s stagger

hero_main.alt: Happy students looking through a window, representing hope and future

about_community.alt: Community meeting circle, representing democratic decision making

project_education.alt: Classroom session, representing structured learning projects

media.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is WCAG AA compliant. Use slate-900 for body text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using amber-500 (accent color) for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a high-trust, emotionally resonant interface. Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' looks. Use the 'Bento' grid for the project showcase.
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_panel: Keep the admin panel clean and dense (Mode B grid). Use Shadcn tables and forms. Do not over-animate the admin side.
instructions_to_main_agent.public_pages: Use 'Mode A' grid. Prioritize storytelling. The 'Donate' button should be prominent in the nav bar (Pill shape, Accent color).
instructions_to_main_agent.navigation: Implement a sticky header that becomes glassmorphic on scroll.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: Use Shadcn Form components but style them with the 'Clean Slate' input styles defined above.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
